note.para: Consideration must be given to perishable cargo in affected zone (FWD Cargo).
Consideration must be given to perishable cargo in affected zone (FWD Cargo).

placard.para: Placard next to upper EICAS screen "FWD CARGO HEATING SYSTEM INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar the FWD CARGO FAN circuit breaker (B-2) at P34 panel.
Open and collar the FWD CARGO HEAT FAN CONTROL circuit breaker (N17) on P11 panel.
